definitions.definition: Regions beneath the surface of the earth, both natural (eg. caves) and man-made (eg. mines).
Synonym of subway : a railway that is under the ground .
A movement or organisation of people who resist political convention.
examples: the French underground during World War II

definitions.definition: A movement or organisation of people who resist artistic convention.

main_definition: ( geography ) Regions beneath the surface of the earth, both natural (eg. caves) and man-made (eg. mines).
secondary_definitions: ( chiefly British ) Synonym of subway : a railway that is under the ground .
( with definite article ) A movement or organisation of people who resist political convention.
( with definite article ) A movement or organisation of people who resist artistic convention.
